task.title: Showing All Tags in Library
task.shortdesc: You can see all of the tags used in a specific library by using the Tag Selector Tool.

context.p: You may want to see all of the tags used in a library when determining how to tag a new item. Tags not assigned to currently shown items are grayed out.

step.cmd: Click on the multi-color button in the lower-right corner of the Tag Selection Tool
Select “Display All Tags in This Library”
